mapper.select: SELECT a.id ,t.id AS shopId,t.shop_name AS shopName,t.`member_id` AS shopMemberId, (SELECT NAME FROM t_member m WHERE t.member_id=m.id) AS shopMember, a.apply_member_id AS applyMemberId,allied_shop_id AS alliedShopId, allied_status AS alliedStatus, t.shop_img AS shopImg,t.area_name AS areaName,t.shop_address AS shopAddress, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_cars WHERE shop_id=t.id) AS shopCarNum FROM t_shop t,( SELECT c.* FROM t_shop_allied c WHERE c.is_deleted = 0 AND c.allied_status=2 AND (c.shop_id=#{shopAllied.shopId} OR c.allied_shop_id=#{shopAllied.shopId}) ) a WHERE t.is_deleted = 0 AND t.audit_status=2 AND (t.id=a.shop_id OR t.id=a.allied_shop_id) AND t.id !=#{shopAllied.shopId}

SELECT a.id ,t.id AS shopId,t.shop_name AS shopName,t.`member_id` AS shopMemberId, (SELECT NAME FROM t_member m WHERE t.member_id=m.id) AS shopMember, a.apply_member_id AS applyMemberId,allied_shop_id AS alliedShopId, allied_status AS alliedStatus, t.shop_img AS shopImg,t.area_name AS areaName,t.shop_address AS shopAddress, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_cars WHERE shop_id=t.id) AS shopCarNum FROM t_shop t, t_shop_allied a WHERE a.is_deleted = 0 AND a.allied_status=1 AND t.is_deleted = 0 AND t.audit_status =2 AND a.allied_shop_id=t.id AND t.id =#{shopAllied.alliedShopId}

SELECT DISTINCT t.id,t.shop_name AS shopName,t.`member_id` AS shopMemberId, (SELECT NAME FROM t_member m WHERE t.member_id=m.id) AS shopMember, t.shop_img AS shopImg,t.area_name AS areaName,t.shop_address AS shopAddress, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_cars WHERE shop_id=t.id) AS shopCarNum, IFNULL((SELECT DISTINCT allied_status FROM t_shop_allied WHERE #{shopAllied.shopId}=shop_id OR #{shopAllied.shopId}=allied_shop_id ),0) AS alliedStatus FROM t_shop t WHERE t.is_deleted = 0 AND t.audit_status=2 and t.member_id !=#{shopAllied.shopMemberId}
AND t.shop_name like concat(concat('%', #{shopAllied.shopName}), '%')
